channel.title: Truffles on Recology
channel.description: Recent content in Truffles on Recology

item.title: finding truffles
item.description: The bad thing about making software is that you can sometimes make it easier for someone to shoot themselves in the foot. The good thing about software is that you can make more software to help them not shoot a foot off. The R package vcr, an R port of the Ruby library of the same name, records and plays back HTTP requests. Some HTTP requests can have secrets (e.g., passwords, API keys, etc.
